The shop

- Here at The Little Green Larder we have a selection of over 300 refillable items including whole foods, dried foods, sweets, liquids, cleaning products and more.

- Customers bring their own containers to fill up, eliminating the use of single use plastic that is polluting our planet.

- We are located at 272 Perth Road in the West end of Dundee.

- Our shop is easily accessible by walking, cycling, driving and public transport.

Opening Hours

- Weekdays 10am-6pm

- Saturday 10am-4pm

- Sunday 12am-4pm
